verses.verse: Help, <S%H3467><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for the godly man <S%H2623><s%> ceases. <S%H1584><s%> For the faithful <S%H539><s%> fail <S%H6461><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

Everyone <S%H376><s%> lies <S%H7723><s%> to <S%H1696><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> They speak <S%H1696><s%> with flattering <S%H2513><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and with a double <S%H3820><s%> heart. <S%H3820><s%>
May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> cut off <S%H3772><s%> all flattering <S%H2513><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> that <S%H1696><s%> boasts, <S%H1419><s%>
who have said, <S%H559><s%> "With our tongue <S%H3956><s%> we will prevail. <S%H1396><s%> Our lips <S%H8193><s%> are our own. <S%H113><s%> Who is lord over us?"

"Because of the oppression <S%H7701><s%> of the weak <S%H6041><s%> and because of the groaning <S%H603><s%> of the needy, <S%H34><s%> I will now arise, <S%H6965><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> "I will set <S%H7896><s%> him in safety <S%H3468><s%> from those who malign him. <S%H6315><s%>"

The words <S%H565><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are flawless <S%H2889><s%> words, <S%H565><s%> as silver <S%H3701><s%> refined <S%H6884><s%> in a clay <S%H776><s%> furnace, <S%H5948><s%> purified <S%H2212><s%> seven times. <S%H7659><s%>
You will keep <S%H8104><s%> them, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. You will preserve <S%H5341><s%> them from this <S%H2098><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> on every side, <S%H5439><s%> when what is vile <S%H2149><s%> is exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the sons of men. <S%H1121><s%>
